column1: The Purple Pig////Since pig is in the name
column2: we tried the fried pig ears and the shoulder (pictured). The ears were awesome
column3: but our favorite dish of the night was the prosciutto stuffed calamari -- just incredible. The shoulder was solid
column4: but it was pretty standard fare
column5: especially when compared to some of the other dishes. The scallops were tasty
column6: and the cheesecake was great too. Some people might not like the tight quarters / communal seating
column7: but the ambiance is awesome and the service is solid.
